mapper.select: select notice_id, title, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') from notice;
select notice_id, title, content, img, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') from notice where notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, img, created_at) value (#{title}, #{content}, #{img}, NOW());
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{request.title}, content = #{request.content}, img = #{request.img} where notice_id = #{noticeId}
